question: more info, information, inf, more, about, what, what is this?, ye kya hy? Aap ka software kis kaam ka hai?
answer: Ye ek complete school management solution hai jo admissions, fees, attendance, exams, aur reports automate karta hai.

question: Price kitni hai?
answer: Price modules aur features ke hisaab se hoti hai, humse contact karke aap detailed quotation le sakte hain.

question: Mobile app available hai?
answer: Ji haan, Android aur iOS dono versions available hain.

question: Demo mil sakta hai?
answer: Bilkul, hum aapko free live demo provide karte hain.

question: Software online chal sakta hai?
answer: Ji haan, ye cloud based aur offline dono modes me chal sakta hai.

question: Data secure hai?
answer: Ji haan, hum data encryption aur regular backups ka use karte hain.

question: Kitne users access le sakte hain?
answer: Unlimited users le sakte hain, bas aapke plan par depend karta hai.

question: Fee management kaise hoti hai?
answer: Aap fee structures set kar sakte hain, fee collection record kar sakte hain, aur reports generate kar sakte hain.

question: Attendance ka feature hai?
answer: Ji haan, teachers aur students dono ke liye attendance module available hai.

question: Result banane ka system hai?
answer: Ji haan, aap exams create karke automatic mark sheets aur results generate kar sakte hain.

question: SMS sending ka option hai?
answer: Ji haan, aap students aur parents ko SMS send kar sakte hain.

question: WhatsApp notification ka feature hai?
answer: Haan, hum WhatsApp notification integration provide karte hain.

question: ID cards banane ka option hai?
answer: Haan, aap students ke ID cards design aur print kar sakte hain.

question: Timetable banane ka feature hai?
answer: Ji haan, teachers aur classes ke liye timetable create kar sakte hain.

question: Homework assign kar sakte hain?
answer: Ji haan, homework module teachers ko assign aur students ko receive karne ka option deta hai.

question: Parent portal available hai?
answer: Haan, parents apne bacho ka data, attendance, aur results dekh sakte hain.

question: Teacher portal available hai?
answer: Haan, teachers apni classes, attendance, aur homework manage kar sakte hain.

question: Library management ka option hai?
answer: Haan, books issue, return, aur fine calculation ke liye module available hai.

question: Transport ka record rakh sakte hain?
answer: Haan, buses, routes aur students ki transport details manage hoti hain.

question: Hostel management ka feature hai?
answer: Haan, hostel rooms, bed allocation, aur mess management ke liye module hai.

question: Inventory ka record rakhte ho?
answer: Ji haan, school ki inventory aur assets ka record maintain hota hai.

question: Examination schedule ban sakta hai?
answer: Ji haan, exams schedule aur seat plan banane ka feature hai.

question: Certificate banane ka option hai?
answer: Haan, transfer aur leaving certificates generate kar sakte hain.

question: Multi branch support hai?
answer: Haan, ek hi software se multiple branches manage kar sakte hain.

question: Online admission form hota hai?
answer: Haan, students online apply kar sakte hain.

question: Payroll ka feature hai?
answer: Ji haan, teachers aur staff ke liye salary management hota hai.

question: Marks entry ka process kaisa hai?
answer: Teachers apne portal se marks enter kar sakte hain jo automatic calculate hote hain.

question: Exam grading customize kar sakte hain?
answer: Haan, grading schemes aap khud define kar sakte hain.

question: Report cards automatic ban jati hain?
answer: Haan, marks enter karne ke baad report cards automatic ban jati hain.

question: Multiple languages support hota hai?
answer: Haan, software multi-language support karta hai.

question: Offline backup ka option hai?
answer: Ji haan, aap apne data ka offline backup le sakte hain.

question: Online payment ka feature hai?
answer: Haan, students fees online pay kar sakte hain.

question: Custom reports ban sakti hain?
answer: Haan, aap apne hisaab se reports design kar sakte hain.

question: Staff attendance ka feature hai?
answer: Haan, staff ki attendance record hoti hai.

question: Leave management hota hai?
answer: Haan, teachers aur staff ki leaves approve aur track ki ja sakti hain.

question: Security cameras ka integration hai?
answer: Optionally, CCTV feed integration possible hai.

question: Software me kaun kaun modules hote hain?
answer: Admissions, fees, attendance, exams, library, transport, hostel, payroll, inventory, aur reports.

question: Upgrade ka process kaisa hai?
answer: Software updates automatic ya manual diye jate hain.

question: Training provide karte ho?
answer: Haan, free online training provide karte hain.

question: Support kaise milti hai?
answer: Call, WhatsApp, aur email se support milta hai.

answer: Latest web technologies me bana hai jo fast aur secure hai.

answer: Normal internet aur basic PC/Android device.

answer: Haan, aapka purana data import ho sakta hai.

answer: Haan, 7 din ka free trial available hai.

answer: Haan, aapki zarurat ke mutabiq customize karte hain.

answer: Ji haan, secure cloud hosting available hai.

answer: Haan, daily automatic backups liye jate hain.

answer: Ji haan, aap apni zarurat ke mutabiq multiple languages enable kar sakte hain.

answer: Haan, hum regular automatic updates provide karte hain jisme naye features aur bug fixes hote hain.
